<image: DeviceGray, width: 1360, height: 1437, bpc: 8> Kohler Co. is founded. The company, initially 
 named Kohler & Silberzahn, makes plows and 
 other farm implements. 
 A cast-iron water trough is sold as a bathtub 
 and becomes the first plumbing product 
 manufactured by Kohler Co.
